speaker: President.
english: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0298/2007 ) by Mrs Fraga Estévez, on behalf of the Committee on Fisheries, on the implementation of sustainable fishing in the EU on the basis of maximum sustainable yield ( 2006/2224(INI) ).
original: President. − The next item is the report ( A6-0298/2007 ) by Mrs Fraga Estévez, on behalf of the Committee on Fisheries, on the implementation of sustainable fishing in the EU on the basis of maximum sustainable yield ( 2006/2224(INI) ).
agenda_item: Sustainability in EU fisheries through maximum sustainable yield (debate)
